txt.en: This scavenger hunt card has a list of things to find. They could be anywhere!
Year 7 Tales: Legolas
Defeat Orcs in Rohan ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace.
You completed a scavenger hunt card!
<rgb=#FF00FF>Look</rgb> from the top tower of Ost Galadh in Mirkwood
A dark shape like a cloud, and yet not a cloud, sped towards the company, blotting out light. Suddenly, the great bow of Lórien sang and it fell out of the air.
In the third boat were Legolas and Gimli, who had now become fast friends.
<rgb=#FF00FF>Resist</rgb> the gull's cries upon the piers of Pelargir
Defeated Orcs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Completed scavenger hunt card.
Spot a Nazgûl flying above the Anduin from the shore in Great River
<rgb=#FF00FF>Hug</rgb> Gimli in Cerin Amroth
Slay a Mûmak
Defeat Orcs in Helm's Deep Epic Battles ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF00FF>Dance</rgb> in the Caradhras Snowfall
Completed
<rgb=#FF00FF>Bow</rgb> to your sire Glóin in the Misty Mountains

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Defeated Orcs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Never in my life had I heard gulls, until we came to Pelargir, their wails speaking to me of the sea. The Sea!
A keen-eyed elf, Legolas could spy his father's sylvan kingdom from here.
Let a ploughman plough, but for running light over snow, choose an Elf!
The din of arms rose up. Horns were blown and mûmakil bellowed as they were goaded to war.
DNT lore text
